name: Palak Tempeh (Tempeh In Spinach Tomato Curry) Vegan
description: Palak Tempeh (Tempeh in Spinach Tomato Curry). A creamy and delicious curry that's quick and great for weeknights. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2-3 cups spinach chopped ((fresh or frozen thawed))
1 teaspoon kashmiri garam masala or regular garam massala
2 tablespoons cashews soaked for an hour ((more or less depending on how creamy you want the curry))
1 cup water or more for desired consistency

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the spinach, garlic, ginger, chili pepper and tomatoes with a little water into a smooth puree and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the spinach, garlic, ginger, chili pepper and tomatoes with a little water into a smooth puree and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the cashews separately with little water to make cashew cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the cashews separately with little water to make cashew cream.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and heat on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add oil and heat on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spices and asofetida and cook for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spices and asofetida and cook for 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spinach puree, salt and sugar and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spinach puree, salt and sugar and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped tempeh pieces and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until the spinach curry thickens and starts to leave the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped tempeh pieces and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until the spinach curry thickens and starts to leave the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cashew cream and water for desired curry consistency. Taste and adjust salt and spices.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cashew cream and water for desired curry consistency. Taste and adjust salt and spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for another 6-7 minutes on medium low till the curry comes to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for another 6-7 minutes on medium low till the curry comes to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with with Indian flat breads like Rotis or naans, some sliced tomato salad and pickles! Other variations: Use 1 cup spinach and 1 cup mustard or collard greens!.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with with Indian flat breads like Rotis or naans, some sliced tomato salad and pickles! Other variations: Use 1 cup spinach and 1 cup mustard or collard greens!.

keywords: tempheh curry, vegan curry recipe, vegetable curry
